testcase.name: Prouser Submit a Claim as passenger in bus
testcase.system-out: Given prouser logins into whiplash application..............................passed When prouser enter all mandatory details for claim creation as 'A passenger on a bus' and 'NO' and 'NO'.passed Then claim is created for prouser...........................................passed

testcase.name: Compensator receives claim and claim liability sent to TPA
testcase.system-out: Given Claim is sent to the compensator.....................................passed When compensator receives claim and send to TPA.............................passed Then claims acceptance and liability decision is now sent to TPA............passed

testcase.name: TPA accepts full liability
testcase.system-out: Given Login as TPA..........................................................passed When TPA accepts full liability.............................................passed Then claims acceptance and liability information is passed to claimant......passed

testcase.name: Claimant add losses and fee
testcase.system-out: Given claim liability is accepted...........................................passed When 'prouser' add losses and fee...........................................passed Then claim will proceed to upload medical reports...........................passed

testcase.name: Prouser uploads medical Report
testcase.system-out: Given 'prouser' receives claim..............................................passed When claimant uploads medical report at 'Pending-Medical'...................passed Then report is uploaded and sent to compensator.............................passed

testcase.name: TPA disputes causation at offer and decides not to make any offer
testcase.system-out: Given claimant requests offer to TPA........................................passed When TPA disputes causation at offer........................................passed Then claim is sent to claimant..............................................passed

testcase.name: Claimant accepts the decision and no offer is made
testcase.system-out: Given TPA has disputed causation for prouser................................passed When Prouser accepts the dispute causation no offer.........................passed Then claim moves to Resolved-NoOffer........................................passed

testcase.name: The claim is moved to 'Resolved-NoOffer'
testcase.system-out: Given 'prouser' goes to court...............................................passed When prouser claim status is 'Resolved-NoOffer'.............................passed Then claim is resolved......................................................passed
